skins.shipDescription: Type III Akatsuki-class destroyer number three - Akatsuki.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Ikazuchi, an Akatsuki-class destroyer. I may not look like it, but I'm a Sakura Empire veteran. Even Yamato calls me... um, what was I called again? Anyways, it was something like that! You can count on me to do my job! Also, see that LIKE button? Give it a good tap and make sure to subscribe to my channel!
skins.acquisition: I am Ikazuchi¡­I¡¯m simply not very talkative...I think you¡¯ll be seeing a lot more of me in the future, Commander.
skins.login: I see! You just "logged in" didn't you? Human language sure is profound...
skins.details: If you bow deep and beg for it, I'll make your wishes basically come true! ... It didn't work? Um, well... that's because you haven't wished hard enough yet!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Almost as fast as Shimakaze? So, the wind is faster than thunder and lighting?
skins.secretaryIdle2: I see! So Inazuma-chan landed the "First Strike" in the World War!
skins.secretaryIdle3: I see! So if I stay in the shipyard all the time I'll become a "Phoenix"! Yep, I'd be a... "Thunder Phoenix"...?
skins.secretaryTouch: I see! This is one of those ordinary "greeting" things, right?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Uh, umm... is this what I think it is? I know full well the meaning of w-what you did! I-I see...

skins.shipDescription: Ikazuchi, Ikazuchi has been transformed into tea! What should we do! Inazuma and Ikazuchi will get slurped up by the Commander!
skins.acquisition: Ikazuchi, Ikazuchi has been transformed into tea! What should we do! Inazuma and Ikazuchi will get slurped up by the Commander!
skins.details: If it's inevitable, then hopefully the Commander will only take a small bite¡­. no, wrong! It¡¯s, it¡¯s probably better if Ikazuchi can be spared just this one time!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Ikazuchi, Ikazuchi still have a lot of anime to catch up on, Commander. At least let Ikazuchi finish the season she¡¯s watching! Pretty please!
skins.secretaryIdle2: It smells so, so good¡­ Ikazuchi just can¡¯t take it anymore and wants to have a bite.
skins.secretaryIdle3: That being the case! What would Ikazuchi be like in another world¡­ then?
skins.secretaryTouch: C-Commander, Ikazuchi is falling off from the plate, whoaaa¡ª
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Ha¡­ So it turns out that the Commander already knew Ikazuchi is Ikazuchi...

skins.shipDescription: Inazuma and I have been to a lot of festivals together, but this would be the first time that I've gone with you, Commander. Isn't this totally like a date?
I'm the fairy of thunder that shatters the night to herald the dawn! I see, I see! That is a good backstory! Commander, want to head to the party together?
